title: anthroposophical
description: Definition, Synonyms, Translations of anthroposophical by The Free Dictionary
cleaned_text: Medicine](//www.thefreedictionary.com/anthroposophical+medicine) an·thro·pos·o·phy(nthr-ps-f) n. A system of beliefs and practice based on the teachings of Rudolf Steiner and maintaining that by correct training and personal discipline one can attain experience of the spiritual world. [ [anthropo-](anthropo-)+ [(theo)sophy](theosophy).] anthro·po·sophi·cal (-p-sf-kl) adj. anthro·poso·phist n. American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, Fifth Edition.
